feed.title: Mikko Lauri
feed.subtitle: Researcher in Computer Science and Robotics. Multi-agent decision-making under uncertainty, active perception, and deep learning for robot vision.

entry.title: Website started
entry.content: Today, the first version of the website is up. I used jekyll, along with the minimal-mistakes theme and jekyll-scholar plugin for citations.
entry.summary: Today, the first version of the website is up. I used jekyll, along with the minimal-mistakes theme and jekyll-scholar plugin for citations.
